column1: Table S12: Macroevolutionary correlates of interspecific variation in tail autotomy. Shown are the results of a Bayesian phylogenetic logistic regression, computed in MCMCglmm. Statistically significant coefficients are highlighted in grey. Note that Anomaluromorpha have 0 species with autotomy and Castorimorpha only 2, and thus are both omitted from analysis.
